org.jivesoftware.smackx.bytestreams

Interface BytestreamListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InBandBytestreamListener, Socks5BytestreamListener

    public interface BytestreamListener
    BytestreamListener are notified if a remote user wants to initiate a bytestream. Implement this interface to handle incoming bytestream requests.

    BytestreamListener can be registered at the Socks5BytestreamManager or the InBandBytestreamManager.

    There are two ways to add this listener. See BytestreamManager.addIncomingBytestreamListener(BytestreamListener) and BytestreamManager.addIncomingBytestreamListener(BytestreamListener, String) for further details.

    Socks5BytestreamListener or InBandBytestreamListener provide a more specific interface of the BytestreamListener.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void incomingBytestreamRequest(BytestreamRequest request)
      This listener is notified if a bytestream request from another user has been received.

    • Method Detail

      • incomingBytestreamRequest

        void incomingBytestreamRequest(BytestreamRequest request)
        This listener is notified if a bytestream request from another user has been received.
        Parameters:
        request - the incoming bytestream request
